body:
I recently changed my skin, but when I went to the website I noticed that you can now change your skin to match the Alex model! I immediately remade my skin to match it, and it looks totally more natural than the huge 4-pixel arms.

What do you think about the new model? Are you going to change your skin to match the new model, or stick with the Steve? 

Share your opinions below :)

title: 1.8 Skin Model
